title: The boke of Magna Carta with diuers other statutes, whose names appere in the nexte lefe folowynge, translated into Englyshe.
author: England.
publisher: In Fletestrete, by me Robert Redman, dwellyng at the sygne of the George, nexte to Saynt Dunstones church],
notes: Translated by George Ferrers, whose name appears on the colophon leaf.
Includes the text of part 1 of STC 9271 only.
Printer's name and address from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
